description:
This course is designed to give you the ground knowledge to pass the FAA's Private Pilot Knowledge Test ...but I'm not there yet. Right now, I have about three chapters of useful material complete. It's valuable stuff, though. There's 3+ hours of material. I'd charge my students $60 per hour for that. This is an incredible deal!

Definitely start your flight training concurrently with this course. I've added a few useful handouts and put FAA sample questions throughout the material.
title: Private Pilot Ground School: Your First Steps to Flying
